history.proof: intros. revert dependent n. induction m. - intros. inversion H. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros. destruct n. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto l: on use: sum_n_n, Nat.le_succ_diag_r, sum_n_m_Chasles unfold: sum_n_m.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros G a m n H. revert dependent n. induction m. - intros. inversion H. - intros. destruct n. + simpl. rewrite sum_n_n. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite sum_n_Sm. rewrite IHm. rewrite plus_assoc. reflexivity.
